column2:
pge_bay_chart <-
  pge_bayzips_date %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(
    aes(
      x = Date,
      y = TOTALKBTU,
      fill = CUSTOMERCLASS
    ),
    stat = "identity",
    position = "stack"
  ) +
  labs(
    x = "Month",
    y = "KBTU",
    title = "9 Bay Area Counties Monthly Electric & Gas Usage, 2017-2020",
    fill = "Energy Type"
  ) 

pge_bay_chart %>% 
  ggplotly() %>% 
  layout(
    xaxis = list(fixedrange = T),
    yaxis = list(fixedrange = T)
  ) %>% 
  config(displayModeBar = F)
